item.title: Ethics Blog
item.description:
Ethics and Communication for Data Science and AI

The Anonymous Survey That Wasn’t A simple student survey and the ethical problems hiding inside

I remember filling out course evaluations as a student. You get a link, you write your thoughts, and you assume nobody will connect your feedback back to you. That’s the point of anonymity, right?

So when I saw this assignment about a survey that promised anonymity but had design problems, it got me thinking. As someone studying data analysis now, and as someone who has run businesses, I realize these ethical questions are real.
